issue.title: [Rust] PrimitiveArray<T> should support simple math operations
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3880](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3880). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Given two primitive arrays of numeric types, it should be possible to perform simple math operations such as add, subtract, multiply, divide.
